name: Qpons
tag_list: sms, advertising, text, nearu, coupons, qpons
overview:
Qpons is a turn-key service that provides SMS distribution technology, a functional web interface, and comprehensive management and reporting tools to utilize text messaging as a mobile permission marketing tool. Qpons Small Business Edition is the first product.

Qpons is built on the NearU Search Platform, which allows two-way communication between advertiser and subscriber, as well as the ability to search locally for advertiser Qpons and business listings.
